name: airbroke
description: Open Source Error Catcher (Airbrake/Sentry-compatible) built with Next.js and Postgres.

AUTH_SECRET.description: Auth.js secret used to sign cookies and tokens.

NEXT_SERVER_ACTIONS_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Optional: set this if you run multiple dynos/instances so Server Actions encryption is consistent across servers.

AIRBROKE_CORS_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for /api/v3/notices and /api/sentry/*/envelope CORS (or '*' for quick starts).
